snippet: FRIEDMAN--Reeva, 66, passed away peacefully, surrounded by family April 3. Survived by husband of 38 years Richard, sons Joshua and Aaron, grandson Elliot, brother Joel and father Sam. Beloved by family, friends and coworkers for her uplifting spirit, energy and devotion. Remembered as a fighter, who never let cancer define or impede her life. Earned two Masters degrees and achieved great success in a 30 year pharmaceutical career. Will be deeply missed and never forgotten. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Reeva, 66, passed away peacefully, surrounded by family April 3. Survived by husband of 38 years Richard, sons Joshua and Aaron, grandson Elliot, brother Joel and father Sam. Beloved by family, friends and coworkers for her uplifting spirit, energy and devotion. Remembered as a fighter, who never let cancer define or impede her life. Earned two Masters degrees and achieved great success in a 30 year pharmaceutical career. Will be deeply missed and never forgotten. 1/3
